Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Biomedical Material/Reagent/Image Enhancement Agent/Contrast Agent/Meglumine Amidotrizoate
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A contrast medium based on diatrizoic acid or amidotrizoic acid solutions. Meglumine amidotrizoate is used in a wide variety of imaging procedures including: cerebral, thoracic, abdominal and extremity angiography, phlebography, computerized tomography, for visualisation of cavities of the body, amniography, arthrography, fistulography, hysterosalpingography, vesiculography. (NCI04)
